File /std/room/delivery_room.c

This object provides a simple interface to the delivery inheritable. It combines room and delivery functions.

Written by Taffyd

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c and /std/delivery.c

These are functions that everyone can access.
